info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 12 at 12:21AM CDT until June 12 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ROCK ISLAND AND CENTRAL SCOTT COUNTIES... At 1221 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Davenport Municipal Airport, or near Davenport, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Bettendorf, Riverdale, Panorama Park and Blackhawk State Park around 1225 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Moline, East Moline, Silvis, Hampton, Rapids City, Carbon Cliff, Rock Island County Fairgrounds, Silvis Heights, Campbells Island, Pleasant Valley and Coal Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
